PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-02862013-03-07HRSDC,  ,  ,  , 
ActEmployment Insurance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS in order to align the Regulations with specific amendments to the Employment Insurance Act brought by the Government's Jobs, Growth and Long-term Prosperity Act in June 2012 to ensure correct implementation of the Variable Best Weeks approach used to calculate a claimant’s EI benefit rate.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0045 Publication Date: 2013-03-27
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
precis: Regulations amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS in order to align the Regulations with specific amendments to the Employment Insurance Act brought by the Government's Jobs, Growth and Long-term Prosperity Act in June 2012 to ensure correct implementation of the Variable Best Weeks approach used to calculate a claimant’s EI benefit rate.
